bugphyzz

Source: vignettes/bugphyzz.Rmd
bugphyzz.Rmd

Introduction

The bugphyzz package provides access to an electronic resource of harmonized microbial annotations from different sources. The resource can also be accessed by direct download at >>> insert Zenodo link here <<<.

Import bugphyzz 

if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")

## Devel version
BiocManager::install("waldronlab/bugphyzz")
library(bugphyzz)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
bp <- importBugphyzz(version = 'devel', force_download = TRUE)
#> Registered S3 method overwritten by 'httr':
#>   method           from  
#>   print.cache_info hoardr
#> Replacing previous version downloaded on 2023-12-14 05:38:19.
#> Using data downloaded on 2023-12-14 05:39:55.
head(bp)
#>   NCBI_ID                          Taxon_name    Rank        Attribute_group
#> 1  105825 butyrate-producing bacterium A2-207 species hydrogen gas producing
#> 2  105829  butyrate-producing bacterium A1-86 species hydrogen gas producing
#> 3  105830 butyrate-producing bacterium T1-815 species hydrogen gas producing
#> 4  105833 butyrate-producing bacterium L1-952 species hydrogen gas producing
#> 5  105834  butyrate-producing bacterium L1-81 species hydrogen gas producing
#> 6  105835 butyrate-producing bacterium L1-810 species hydrogen gas producing

Explore wich attribute groups are available

Explore which attribute signatures are available 

head(unique(bp$Attribute))
#> [1] "hydrogen gas producing--TRUE"  "hydrogen gas producing--FALSE"
#> [3] "lactate producing--FALSE"      "lactate producing--TRUE"      
#> [5] "Sphingolipid producing--TRUE"  "acetate producing--TRUE"

Creating signatures

Create signatures of taxids at the genus level for aerophilicity 

aer <- bp[which(bp$Attribute_group == 'aerophilicity'),]
sigs1 <- getBugphyzzSignatures(
  df = aer, tax.id.type = 'NCBI_ID', tax.level = 'genus', min.size = 10
)
map(sigs1, head)
#> $`bugphyzz:aerophilicity|aerobic|g`
#> [1]      10 1000999 1004300    1007 1007082 1008195
#> 
#> $`bugphyzz:aerophilicity|anaerobic|g`
#> [1] 100132 100175 100883 101191 102106 104175
#> 
#> $`bugphyzz:aerophilicity|facultatively anaerobic|g`
#> [1]    1016 1036132 1069494 1078829  111142  111500

Create signatures of taxa names at the species level for optimal ph 

op <- bp[bp$Attribute_group == 'optimal ph', ]
sigs2 <- getBugphyzzSignatures(
  df = op, tax.id.type = 'Taxon_name', tax.level = 'species', min.size = 10
)
map(sigs2, head)
#> $`bugphyzz:optimal ph|acidic <=6|s`
#> [1] "Chlorobaculum tepidum"            "Hippea alviniae"                 
#> [3] "Streptococcus macacae"            "Streptococcus ferus"             
#> [5] "Paenibacillus polymyxa"           "Alicyclobacillus acidoterrestris"
#> 
#> $`bugphyzz:optimal ph|alkaline 8-9.76|s`
#> [1] "Proteus penneri"             "Corynebacterium nuruki"     
#> [3] "Kurthia massiliensis"        "Rhodococcus pyridinivorans" 
#> [5] "Halorhodospira halophila"    "Thermoanaerobacter italicus"
#> 
#> $`bugphyzz:optimal ph|neutral 6-8|s`
#> [1] "Leptospira alexanderi"           "Pyrococcus yayanosii"           
#> [3] "Methanomethylovorans hollandica" "Phycicoccus elongatus"          
#> [5] "Capnocytophaga gingivalis"       "Thiothrix nivea"

Other examples 

mot <- bp[bp$Attribute_group == 'motility',]
sigs3 <- getBugphyzzSignatures(
  df = mot, tax.id.type = 'Taxon_name', tax.level = 'mixed'
)
lapply(sigs3, head)
#> $`bugphyzz:motility|motility--FALSE|t`
#> [1] "Nitrosarchaeum koreense MY1"        "Leyella stercorea DSM 18206"       
#> [3] "Methylophaga aminisulfidivorans MP" "Neisseria wadsworthii 9715"        
#> [5] "Neisseria shayeganii 871"           "Halorhabdus tiamatea SARL4B"       
#> 
#> $`bugphyzz:motility|motility--TRUE|st`
#> [1] "Jeotgalibacillus soli"                 
#> [2] "Metalysinibacillus jejuensis"          
#> [3] "Planococcus halocryophilus Or1"        
#> [4] "Oscillibacter ruminantium GH1"         
#> [5] "Campylobacter insulaenigrae NCTC 12927"
#> [6] "Malaciobacter mytili LMG 24559"

Merge examples above 

sigs <- c(sigs1, sigs2, sigs3)
lapply(sigs, head)
#> $`bugphyzz:aerophilicity|aerobic|g`
#> [1]      10 1000999 1004300    1007 1007082 1008195
#> 
#> $`bugphyzz:aerophilicity|anaerobic|g`
#> [1] 100132 100175 100883 101191 102106 104175
#> 
#> $`bugphyzz:aerophilicity|facultatively anaerobic|g`
#> [1]    1016 1036132 1069494 1078829  111142  111500
#> 
#> $`bugphyzz:optimal ph|acidic <=6|s`
